title: Title Sequence Squatters
content: I pitched and created an animated title sequence and interstitial graphics for Foil Arms & Hog's first feature-length sitcom episode on YouTube. I completed this project in 5 days, based on the soundtrack they sent to me and a handful behind-the-scenes photos they posted on their Patreon page for fans. Because I didn't know the episode title I created the sequence as a .mogrt so they could adapt it themselves in Premiere Pro.

title: Top Ten Review Card and Lower Thirds Motion Graphics Template
content: Following a minimal lower thirds motion graphic template I had created in 2020, I pitched this revision in a more punchy visual style and more customisation options for Foil Arms & Hog's annual sketch review episode in 2021. They've been using these ever since!

title: My Personal Branding Journey - An Ongoing Story
content: It's been quite a journey to get my personal branding to look exactly the way I wanted. For a long time it felt completely stuck in a Work-In-Progress state, but while building this website I think I found a way out. Or at least, I think I landed on a visual that can speak for me well enough. I don't see much harm in your personal brand to remain an ongoing process. But let me take you along, see what you think!
